name: Gems Classic Adventure
description:
Gems Classic Adventure is a completely new design, which is a combination of stunning visuals and effects inherent shimmering Jewels game, along with incredibly innovative gameplay of 100 levels of appeal.

Features:
- 100 challenging levels and more to come
- Stunning graphics with a highly polished interface
- Sharp and animated visuals fit this saga to surfers life
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
